title: CTRLBuddy
desc: CTRLBuddy is a real-time gaming forum mobile application that enables gamers to create and participate in discussions organized by game titles, featuring live commenting, engagement tracking, and customizable user profiles.
myJob:
This project involved building a full-stack mobile application from the ground up using Flutter and Firebase, creating a Reddit-style forum exclusively for gaming communities.

Key Contributions:

  • Authentication & User Management: Implemented Firebase Authentication with email/password login, complete profile setup flow, and profile editing with 33 customizable profile picture options.
  • Real-time Architecture:
    • Implemented StreamBuilder pattern throughout the app for instant synchronization between devices.
    • Users can chat in real-time with comments appearing instantly on all connected devices.
  • Thread & Comment System:
    • Built game-based thread organization with Cloudinary integration for game cover images.
    • Developed live commenting functionality with dynamic profile picture loading.
    • Created a custom TimeDisplay widget with periodic updates (1s, 2m, 3h ago → full date after 24h).
  • Engagement Features:
    • Implemented array-based like/unlike system for threads and comments to prevent duplicate likes.
    • Developed popularity ranking algorithm combining thread and comment likes.
    • Added visual feedback with filled/outline heart icons.
  • Smart Data Handling:
    • Implemented null-safe design with "Deleted User" fallbacks for deleted accounts.
    • Profile picture changes propagate across all user content dynamically.
  • UI/UX Enhancements:
    • Built responsive layouts with proper scroll padding for floating UI elements.
    • Implemented immersive mode, hiding system navigation bars.
    • Created custom widgets including horizontal cards, content cards, and search cards.
    • Added profile picture selector with modal grid display.

This project demonstrates my ability to architect and build complex real-time applications with modern mobile development practices, focusing on user experience and performance optimization.
